name: Time Capsule Hunt

objectives.desc: Search the old library for the first encoded holotape.
Find a cryptologist to decode the holotape puzzle.
Follow the decoded message to the abandoned school.
Solve the pre-war puzzle to locate the time capsule.
Dig up the time capsule at the marked location.
Open the time capsule and discover its contents.

stages.desc: Begin the hunt at the old library.
Get help decoding the encrypted message.
Follow the trail to the school.

satirical_messages.title: A Letter to the Future
satirical_messages.content: Dear future person, if you're reading this, we're probably all dead. Enjoy our collection of useless crap! - The Class of 2077

satirical_messages.title: Pre-War Social Commentary
satirical_messages.content: We spent more on this time capsule than on education. Priorities! Also, democracy is awesome. Unless you disagree.

satirical_messages.title: Apocalypse Prediction
satirical_messages.content: If nuclear war hasn't destroyed everything, we're shocked. If it has, we're not surprised. Either way, we're disappointed.

satirical_messages.title: Consumer Culture Manifesto
satirical_messages.content: Remember: the more stuff you buy, the happier you are! This message brought to you by every corporation ever.

hidden_treasure.desc: A perfectly preserved Nuka-Cola from before the war. Worth a fortune to collectors.

notes: A lighthearted quest with dark humor about pre-war American culture. The 'treasure' is worthless junk, but the messages offer massive XP and social commentary.
